info.author: Matthew Arcidy
info.description:
===========
ManyDB
===========

ManyDB is a set of scripts to privide a single interface to a 
project which uses many databases.  It allows naming a specific
database and easily handling multiple dbs. Typical usage::

    #!/usr/bin/env python

    from manydb import manydb
    readdb = manydb.opendb( 'dbforreading' )
    writedb = mandb.opendb( 'dbforwriting' )
    
    writedb['/object/path'] = readdb['/object/path'].record
info.name: ManyDB
info.summary: tools for working with many databases
